ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Areas of drizzle and a chance of rain. Cloudy, with a high near 42. North wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
